nodes.text: The Qixoni Nebula was located in the Southern Core portion of the Colonies. The nebula shared its name with the Qixoni crystals, a type of crystal that had formed on a planet before its star exploded as a supernova and destroyed it millennia before 3951 BBY.

The Qixoni Nebula was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square K-13. The book also placed the nebula in the Expansion Region, despite grid square K-13 not intersecting the region. The StarWars.com Online Companion to The Essential Atlas later corrected the placement by establishing that the Qixoni Nebula lay in the Colonies instead.
